title: Didn't get an icon from last years Snowdown Showdown.
body: So during like the first two weeks, or sometime after the first two weeks, of the snowdown, i gifted a friend two skins (not mystery gift skins), and i did not get my SNOW DAY SCUTTLER ICON. I am still waiting on it nearly 7 days later, i am wondering where it is. As it says on the promo page that the icons are available till the 9th of January of this year, and it's already the 15th of January. So where is the icon?

replies.body: We're actually sending Snowdown icons out until the end of the month, so there's a bit of time left before it gets to you. If you don't have it by the end of the month, hit us up in a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll help you out. ^.^

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=h5arKlOM,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-01-17T04:54:21.020+0000)
>
> We're actually sending Snowdown icons out until the end of the month, so there's a bit of time left before it gets to you. If you don't have it by the end of the month, hit us up in a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll help you out. ^.^

Ah, alright! I had no idea that was happening at all, thank you very much for the clarification, Targons Blade, interesting name by the way! ^^
